about_the_game:
Story

After spending two light-hearted years on campus, I moved on to my junior year. However, I was not only faced with the challenges of graduation and internships, but also suddenly told that I must find my destined soulmate soon, or else I would perish due to a curse.

As if it were fated, my childhood playmate who I hadn't seen in ages suddenly reappeared. My friend's sister showed a keen interest in me, a senior I met by chance generously offered a referral, and even the manager at my internship company cast intrigued glances my way...

Who among them is my fated one, and who has an axe to grind? Hesitantly, I move forward, trying to find answers in the fog...

Characters

Selene Yan(First name can be customized)

Protagonist, a junior majoring in management at Ocean City University, is struggling with internship and employment.

She is always sensitive to other’s emotion with gentle and considerate personality, thus favored by those close to her.

Nyx Xia

The playmate in childhood, had arranged marriage with protagonist before birth, which was canceled because they were of the same gender. Several years after, they meet again.

She has cheerful personality, but sometimes she can be a bit somber.

Iris Wen

The senior, the president of Student Council, provides protagonist with the internship referral.

Outwardly, she appears gentle and kind to others, but she often suppresses a darker side. Few can truly get into her heart.

Eleanor Si

An external student, from the Ocean City School of Business, Cassidy's twin sister.

Because of the desire to new knowledge, she attends classes in Cassidy's place, meets and develops interest in the protagonist.

Victoria Qi

The general manager of HuanYu company, a high-achieving returnee with dual degrees.

During protagonist's internship, the general manager provides her with support.

With a serious and disciplined personality, she is efficient and cautious, often appearing somewhat impersonal in her work.

Contents

Set against the backdrop of college and the workplace, it is a Yuri visual novel that includes elements of everyday romance, fantasy, and alternative reality.

The game features a storyline of 300,000 words, 40＋ CGs, 4 romanceable characters, and 7 supporting characters (all female).

Problematic Elements

Imprisonment, unethical relationships,  mind break, etc.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
